headsection.p: The aim of this page is to collect useful FTL libraries on a centralized, well known place. We encourage everybody to send his/her useful libraries, so other FreeMarker users can benefit from them.

section.title: The libraries
section.p: If you want your product appear here, contact us. Also, anybody wants to improve the above libraries is welcome!

tr.td: RTF-generator. Macros and TemplateMethodModel for generating simple Unicode RTF documents purely with macro calls and an escape directive (i.e. no raw RTF in the template). Contributed by Assaf Urieli at Joliciel Informatique.
